  index: "imdb",
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      title: {
        type: "text",
        term_vector: "yes",
      },

        type: "text",
      },
      tags: {
        type: "text",
        fields: {
          raw: {
            type: "text",
            analyzer: "keyword",
            term_vector: "yes",
          },
        },
